EmailTemplate.name: (icp) Incompatibility
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
The lens you have selected is incompatible with the _____. As stated on the site, the EF-M lens is only compatible with the EOS-M camera body. Please select only EF or EF-S lens, as these will both mount with your camera. Please let me know which lens you would like to swap for, and I can adjust your rental, as well as re-send an updated invoice. If you need assistance in making a selection, we are happy to help.
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} BorrowLenses.com Verifications Team verify@borrowlenses.com (844) 853-6737 x4
